title: Watering Schedule
description: Water your indoor plants only when the top inch of soil feels dry. Overwatering can lead to root rot.

title: Sunlight Needs
description: Place your plants near bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid direct afternoon sun to prevent leaf burn.

title: Soil Selection
description: Use well-draining potting soil. For succulents or cacti, add sand or perlite to improve drainage.

title: Humidity Levels
description: Keep humidity between 40â€“60%. Mist leaves or use a humidifier for tropical plants.

title: Fertilizing Routine
description: Feed your plants monthly with a balanced liquid fertilizer during the growing season (spring to summer).

title: Pruning & Trimming
description: Regularly trim dead or yellow leaves to promote new growth and keep your plant looking fresh.
